description: Non material Minor admendment of planning permission P092187 dated 30 April 2010 to vary condition 3 (CCTV general lighting and security lighting)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION

i) Application site excluding the area of the north east building

Details of 
a)    CCTV;
b)    general lighting; and/or  
c)    security lighting 

for the application site excluding the area of the north east building shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and installed prior to the first occupation of any part of the development other than the north east building. The details shall include the location and full specification of: all lamps; light levels/spill; cameras (detailing view paths); lamps and support structures.  

The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved, shall be maintained as such thereafter and no change there from shall take place without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.

ii) North East Building

Details of
a)    CCTV;
b)    general lighting; and or
c)    security lighting 

for the north east building shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and installed prior to the first occupation of any part of the north east building. The details shall include the location and full specification of: all lamps; light levels/spill; cameras (detailing view paths);lamps and support structures.

The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved, shall be maintained as such thereafter and no change there from shall take place without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.

REASON
To ensure that the any resulting general or security lighting and CCTV cameras are appropriately located and designed and in the interest of protecting neighbouring residential amenity and the overall design of the building, and to accord with policy Env12 of the Islington UDP (2002).
